subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: This Part is applicable to every building where any of the processes of electro-plating, electro-polishing, anodising or etching are undertaken.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Premises for electro-plating, electro-polishing, anodising or etching mustâ€”

ol.li: provide for the safety and comfort of workers; and
be constructed in a manner that will prevent the escape of liquids and atmospheric contaminants to other areas of the building.
